member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.FilePatternMatch
member.summary: Represents a file that was matched by searching using a globbing pattern.

member.summary: Initializes new instance of .

member.summary: Determines if the specified match is equivalent to the current match using a case-insensitive comparison.
member.param: The other match to be compared.
member.returns: if and are equal using case-insensitive comparison; otherwise, .

member.param: The object to be compared.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.Matcher
member.summary: Searches the file system for files with names that match specified patterns.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.Matcher.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes an instance of using case-insensitive matching.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.Matcher.#ctor(System.StringComparison)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of using the specified string comparison method.
member.param: One of the enumeration values that specifies the culture, case, and sort rules to be used.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.Matcher.AddExclude(System.String)

summary.para: Add a file name pattern for files the matcher should exclude from the results. Patterns are relative to the root directory given when is called.

Use the forward slash '/' to represent directory separator. Use '*' to represent wildcards in file and directory names. Use '**' to represent arbitrary directory depth. Use '..' to represent a parent directory.

member.param: The globbing pattern.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.Matcher.AddInclude(System.String)

summary.para: Add a file name pattern that the matcher should use to discover files. Patterns are relative to the root directory given when is called.

Use the forward slash '/' to represent directory separator. Use '*' to represent wildcards in file and directory names. Use '**' to represent arbitrary directory depth. Use '..' to represent a parent directory.

member.param: The globbing pattern.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.Matcher.Execute(Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.Abstractions.DirectoryInfoBase)
member.summary: Searches the directory specified for all files matching patterns added to this instance of .
member.param: The root directory for the search.
member.returns: Always returns an instance of , even if no files were matched.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.MatcherExtensions.AddExcludePatterns(Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.Matcher,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String}[])
member.summary: Adds multiple exclude patterns to .
member.param: The matcher to which the exclude patterns are added.
A list of globbing patterns.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.MatcherExtensions.AddIncludePatterns(Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.Matcher,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String}[])
member.summary: Adds multiple patterns to include in .
member.param: The matcher to which the include patterns are added.
A list of globbing patterns.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.MatcherExtensions.GetResultsInFullPath(Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.Matcher,System.String)
member.summary: Searches the specified directory for all files matching patterns added to this instance of .
member.param: The matcher.
The root directory for the search.
member.returns: Absolute file paths of all files matched. Empty enumerable if no files matched given patterns.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.MatcherExtensions.Match(Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.Matcher,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Matches the files passed in with the patterns in the matcher without going to disk.
member.param: The matcher that holds the patterns and pattern matching type.
The files to run the matcher against.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.MatcherExtensions.Match(Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.Matcher,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Matches the files passed in with the patterns in the matcher without going to disk.
member.param: The matcher that holds the patterns and pattern matching type.
The root directory for the matcher to match the files from.
The files to run the matcher against.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.MatcherExtensions.Match(Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.Matcher,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Matches the file passed in with the patterns in the matcher without going to disk.
member.param: The matcher that holds the patterns and pattern matching type.
The root directory for the matcher to match the file from.
The file to run the matcher against.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.MatcherExtensions.Match(Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.Matcher,System.String)
member.summary: Matches the file passed in with the patterns in the matcher without going to disk.
member.param: The matcher that holds the patterns and pattern matching type.
The file to run the matcher against.
